attributes.action: start being honest and stand in front of the iraq enquiry before the general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that Gordon Brown should stand in front of the Iraq enquiry before the next general election. He talks of courage  - prove it!

rejection.details: It is up to the independent inquiry committee to decide who to call to give evidence and when that evidence should be given.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
